EmailTemplate.subject: Company Name Validation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We look forward to establishing a new account for your company.
In order to protect the security of our customers, we must validate your involvement with the company. A simple way to do this would be to provide documentation which includes the name and address of your organization. Documentation can include a Purchase Order, a past invoice, or simply an email from your company’s corporate email address.
We appreciate your help in keeping our customers’ data secure! Once we have this additional validation, we will quickly proceed with your account setup.
Visit the exciting new options on our improved, easier to navigate Web Portal atwww.myaerospace.com You can now obtain real time price and availability, place orders and check order status online for avionics, mechanical, wheels and brakes products and exchange programs (SPEX), globally for all of our customers.
If you are AOG, please call us at 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099.
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
{!User.Signature1__c}
Honeywell Aerospace
Customer & Product Support
Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
